title: (x) Anyone recognize this font? / 'Lina': monolinear connected script - Harlow Solid {Bart H}
content:
I desperately need this font for my website, I had it installed on my comp which went on to crash.. now the name is stuck at the back of my head and I can't pick it out

[http://i47.tinypic.com/f53vo9.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013051609/http:/i47.tinypic.com/f53vo9.jpg "http://i47.tinypic.com/f53vo9.jpg")

It can also be seen at the very beginning of this video

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Ax0RcXC8cI](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013051609/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Ax0RcXC8cI "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Ax0RcXC8cI")
author: Chi
